resources.string: Allows Google Now commands to be sent as text to a cars media center.
This app listens for key shortcuts sent from your stereo to initiate Google Now. It also sends text from Google Now to your stereo\'s display so it\'s easier to read.
In order to grab text from Now, this app uses an Accessibility Service.
It looks the service is already enabled!
Car Control is setup! There is no need to return to this app.
Car Control allows you to use Google Now hands-free while driving by initiating now using controls on your steering wheel and displaying text on your car\'s stereo display.
